patthana15.22:4.1: Nahetu sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo nanahetussa nasanidassanasappaṭighassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … pe …
patthana15.22:4.3: nahetu sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo nahetussa nasanidassanasappaṭighassa ca nanahetussa nasanidassanasappaṭighassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana15.22:4.4: Ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā upanissaye purejāte atthiyā avigate tīṇi.
patthana15.22:5.1: Nahetuṃ anidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu naanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana15.22:6.1: Hetuṃ anidassanaappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu naanidassanaappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana15.22:6.2: Nahetuṃ anidassanaappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu naanidassanaappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana15.22:6.3: Hetuṃ anidassanaappaṭighañca nahetuṃ anidassanaappaṭighañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu naanidassanaappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
